attributes.action: Stop funding the war in Yemen. Save Yemen and push the world to do the same.
attributes.additional_details:
Saudi may be fueling the war in Yemen but British weapons are doing the killing, British bombs are being dropped by British planes flown by British trained pilots. Personnel and expertise provided by Britain is being used against the Saudi’s

STOP fuelling the war in Yemen
STOP supplying Saudi with weapons
CANCEL the miltitary export licence to Saudi 
STOP training the Saudi’s on how to destroy Yemen.
PUSH your allies to do the same! 
USE your power and influence to allow aid to reach Yemeni’s
attributes.background:
Stop providing equipment and training that is being used to destroy Yemen. 
Push Saudi Arabia and the United States to make peace in Yemen. At the very least push them to lift the blockades and allow aid to reach the people of Yemen. Stop destroying innocent lives
